qas.question: Who was the general who spoke out against the USSR joining NATO?
To what did the British general compare the USSR in his opposition to their joining NATO?
The USSR's request to join NATO was accepted by which governments?
French General Hastings Ismay was a supporter of what?
Who supported the USSR's 1954 request to join NATO?

plausible_answers.text: an unrepentant burglar requesting to join the police force

qas.question: French General Hastings Ismay compared the USSR joining NATO to what?

context: Again all proposals, including the request to join NATO, were rejected by <b2_0>UK, US, and French<b2_0/> governments shortly after. Emblematic was the position of British General <a0_0><b4_0>Hastings Ismay<b4_0/><a0_0/>, supporter of <b3_0>NATO expansion<b3_0/>, who said that NATO "must grow until the whole free world gets under one umbrella." He opposed the request to join NATO made by the USSR in 1954 saying that "the Soviet request to join NATO is like <b5_0>an unrepentant <a1_0>burglar<a1_0/> requesting to join the police force<b5_0/>".
